body.name: Fadware Nonstick Frying Pan with Lid, Deep Saute Pan 10 Inch for All Cooktops, Induction Deep Frying Pans with Sturdy Stainless Steel Handle, Dishwasher and Oven Safe Pan for Cooking, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 52 mins
features: Built to Last for Countless Cooking Adventures: Masterfully crafted from extra-durable forged aluminum, this deep sauté pan boasts remarkable heat conductivity and unrivaled scratch resistance, making it a reliable kitchen partner that will stand the test of time

Nonstick Interior for Effortless Cooking: With its 3-layer Fadware professional nonstick interior, food release is effortless, and cleanup is a breeze. This feature, combined with the nonstick pan's dishwasher safety and oven safety up to 260°C, makes it a truly low-maintenance cooking powerhouse

Thickened Gauge for Enhanced Durability: The thickened gauge of 4 mm provides unparalleled durability and resistance to warping and denting, giving you peace of mind as you cook with confidence. The sturdy stainless steel handle offers a comfortable grip, allowing you to maneuver the 10 inch saute pan with ease

Glass Lid with Steam Vent for Precise Cooking: The transparent glass lid allows for unobstructed monitoring of your culinary creations, while the integrated steam vent prevents heat loss and promotes even cooking. This feature, coupled with the deep fry pan's compact 26cm/9.5-Inch size, makes it perfect for precision cooking and hassle-free storage

Versatile and Universal Stovetop Compatibility: Whether you've got a gas, induction, electric, glass, ceramic, halogen, or any other type of stovetop, this deep frying pan with lid is ready to perform. Its versatility and compatibility ensure that it's the perfect tool for creating a wide range of dishes, from breakfast favorites to gourmet meals. And with its durable construction, it's sure to impress for many cooking adventures to come
body.description: Frying Pan with Lid Ultra-Durable Non-Stick Saute Pan With exclusive coating technology, Fadware nonstick performance is more excellent than 85% nonstick cookware. Smooth food release. Less oil used, easier cleanup. All stovetops compatible, and prevent hot spot. Energy-saving efficiency is as three times as cast iron. Oven safe and dishwasher safe. Multifunctional set meets all your cooking needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How did I live without a pan like this?
reviews.reviewText: Hybrid of a wok and saute pan. When you don't have a lot of room it's nice to have a pan that will do double duty, and allow you to make a lot of one dish meals for two or three people on the stove top! The non-stick surface is perfect. Heat conduction excellent. It works well on my induction hot plate. Cleans up easily, and looks good. Arrived quickly and in good shape well packaged. First thing I made, was transcaucasus cheese bread, followed by omelettes. Neither the eggs nor the cheese stuck at all. I don't know how long the nonstick finish will last, but everything in life is uncertain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pan!
reviews.reviewText: This is the nicest pan I’ve gotten in a long time. It distributes the heat evenly, sits flat on the burner, and is a snap to clean. I couldn’t be happier with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My mom loves it
reviews.reviewText: So far so good , only had it for 1 month and use it daily . I would recommend if it’s on sale

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and deep
reviews.reviewText: I moved into a much smaller apartment had to get rid of my 12 inch pan this was an excellent replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for making stir fry
reviews.reviewText: I needed a pan for making stir-fry noodles and came across this one. First off, I like that this pan matches all the other pans I have so it's looks like it's apart of the set I own. It comes with a lid so I can cover my food while cooking or when finished so the food can stay warm. The pan heats up well and evenly so cooking time was pretty fast. When it came to washing the pan, super easy to wash it with soap and sponge. I love this pan, I would buy my friends and family this pan so they could try it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the BEST pans I have ever used. I bought some 'non-stick' pans from Walmart not to long ago, and they were awful. After cooking in them a few times, anything I cooked in them started to stick and they were so hard to wash.This pan has been the opposite. It's so easy to cook in and to clean up afterwards. I don't even have to apply pressure with rag to get it clean. It also looks so pretty. It's speckled in white dots and I love the look. It's a good weight, not to light but not overwhelmingly heavy either.This has quickly replaced most of the pans I used to cook in! It's a serious must have for all kitchens!
